info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:26PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Albany, northeastern Greene and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Loudonville to near Westerlo. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, East Greenbush, Rensselaer, Colonie, Nassau, Delmar, Guilderland, Menands, New Baltimore, Ravena, Voorheesville, Castleton-On-Hudson, Loudonville, Feura Bush, Selkirk, New Scotland, Coeymans, Clarksville, Coeymans Hollow and Bleecker Stadium. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 24. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 2. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
